subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: The arbitrator hearing Alex Rodriguez’s appeal of his 211-game doping suspension upheld most of the punishment on Saturday, sidelining him for 162 games, all of next season and the postseason.
snippet: The arbitrator hearing Alex Rodriguez’s appeal of his 211-game doping suspension upheld most of the punishment on Saturday, sidelining him for 162 games, all of next season and the postseason.
